name: EXTENDED MISSION
info: When enough fund is raised, we seek for other opportunities to provide help in other areas:

areas.name: Medicine Cabinet.
areas.description: $500 for complete cabinet. Fund is sent to local evangelical medical professionals for medical supplies in designated remote areas.

areas.name: Medical Mission.
areas.description: HFTF & VN local churches work together to organize events--providing free medical checks for all in the community.

note: Read more on EXTENDED MISSIONS here!
